mapper.update: update menu set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keepAlive = #{keepalive,jdbcType=BIT}, requireAuth = #{requireauth,jdbcType=BIT}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, iconCls = #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, level, pid, path, comment, keepAlive, requireAuth, enabled, iconCls from menu
